channel.title: Blog on Hugo tranquilpeak theme
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Hugo tranquilpeak theme

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello World! The website is up, and now the posting can begin! Over the course of the next few months, I’ll be documenting my journey as I explore and learn about data visualization, spatial analysis, text mining and machine learning (ambitious list, I know). Setting up this Blog For those interested in turning your github page into a similar webpage, I followed the guide provided by Aurora Mareviv here. She has an updated guide if you’re using project pages on github, but I found that the first guide was more straightforward if you’re using your personal github page.
